description:
Recent Updates Include:  **Improved Touchpad FULL SCREEN Compatability**
**Variable Radar Image Opacity 
** Current (most recent per NOAA metar) weather conditions for map center in collapsible pane. Updates whenever you move the map. 
** Hi Contrast is now the default map. 
** Current map time and current system time displayed. Tapping the 'time box' will reload the current map. 
** Cleaned up possible memory leak. 
** Road Map loads better.  
** When no GPS signal present on startup, defaults to last recently viewed rad site. 

WeatherMaps Radar welcomes the TouchPad" introductory pricing of only $1.99 - If you already purchased WM-Radar for your Palm Pre/Veer - email dave@jancoapps.com to be quailifed for a free download of the HD version.

WeatherMaps - Radar, the most advanced dedicated radar app for the Pre, Veer, Pixi & TouchPad, shows the most current Doppler weather radar image for your location on a google map. Once WeatherMaps displays the current radar image, simply 'drag' the map in any direction and once you stop dragging, the app will determine if there's a closer nexrad radar site to the new map center, and display that image. A great way to see if that rain at the edge of your current radar is a huge storm heading your way. Map is zoomable down to street level. Touching the bottom bar will bring up the list of radar images that are available: 
**Base Reflectivity 
**Composite Reflectivity 
**Storm Relative Velocity 
**Storm Base Velocity 
**1 hr Total Rainfall 
**Storm Total Rainfall  

Scheduled Updates: Pinch to zoom (partially implimented). Looping radar images (up to 20 images). 

$1.99 intro pricing will only last for a limited time. There will be additional location based weather apps in the near future. Please email me at dave@jancoapps.com with any questions, comments or bugs issues you may have before leaving an app review. I'm committed to keeping this the best weather radar app in the catalog.
